TextView.android:text: Riven's first ability is her Q. She jumps forwards about 1 teemo and does damage. After each jump it procs her passive. The most basic combo is auto-q-auto-q-auto-q-auto. You can use riven's Q to hop over most walls in the game. It has excellent mobility and decent damage. The cooldown of your Q starts to decrease by the time you use the first cast of it. So you can delay your q until the other one is about to expire and cast it again, and by the time you cast your final q the CD will either by up or almost up. You will want to learn how to fast combo with your Q, the bread and butter of riven.
